description: Luc is a 21 year old college student from California.He enjoys going out with friends or staying home with a lovely young lady and watching a nice chick flick. This shy yet well spoken young man doesn't leave much to be desired, and after a short conversation with him you will realize why he has so many friends.We caught up with Luc in our studio one afternoon for the shoot and we were pleasantly surprised to see the 8x7 cock that he had hidden behind his designer jeans and he has no problem getting it hard either.We follow him around from the couch to the shower and finally the bedroom where he blows his load and decides to take a short nap.Enjoy!
title: Luc
